channel.title: Most disgusting movie ever!
channel.description: I just recently watched The Human Centipede 2, and let's just say it was the most disgusting thing I've ever seen in my life. I thought the first one was bad, but this was just sick as hell. Have you ever watched a movie that is disgusting? If so, please discuss.

item.title: Most disgusting movie ever!
item.dc:creator: @Speljohan Speljohan
item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

[quote=“Fridder, post:41, topic:444674”][quote author=Speljohan link=topic=547360.msg4015394#msg4015394 date=1339577079]
A Serbian Film disturbed me for days after watching it, it’s safe to say it is the absolutely most disgusting movie ever made.
[/quote]

What was so gross about it?

Also, for anyone wanting to watch the Human Centipede 1/2, its on netflix.[/quote]The graphical and psychological violence/sex. Nothing on the internet even gets close.

Read full topic

item.title: Most disgusting movie ever!
item.dc:creator: @Disorder Disorder
item.description:
@Disorder wrote:

A Serbian Film is the best commercial sick movie out there right now, and that’s the limit. It is followed by Martyrs - extreme torture, alive skinning, etc.

IMDb

A Serbian Film (2010)

Directed by Srdjan Spasojevic. With Srdjan 'Zika' Todorovic, Sergej Trifunovic, Jelena Gavrilovic, Slobodan Bestic. An aging porn star agrees to participate in an "art film" in order to make a clean break from the business, only to discover that he...


IMDb

Martyrs (2008)

Directed by Pascal Laugier. With Morjana Alaoui, Mylène Jampanoï, Catherine Bégin, Robert Toupin. A young woman's quest for revenge against the people who kidnapped and tormented her as a child leads her and a friend, who is also a victim of child...
